newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-NAB, Westpac in ATM pact.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-NAB, Westpac in ATM pact.

text.p: National Australia Bank Ltd (NAB) said it had formed an agreement with Westpac Banking Corp to share their ATM (automatic teller machine) networks.
"This interchange arrangement will enable Westpac and National cardholders to use either Bank's ATM network to access account balances and make cash withdrawals," NAB said.

NAB has more Ulan 1030 FlexiTellers nationwide with access to a further 3200 ATM's via network sharing with the Australia and New Zealand Banking Group Ltd, Bank of Melbourne Ltd, Colonial State Bank, Bank of SA, BankWest Ltd, Credit Union RediTellers and now Westpac.
